channel.title: Off-Topic : An Original Media For Gamers Production
channel.itunes:subtitle: Off-Topic
channel.itunes:author: Athalus and Synapse
channel.description: Off-Topic is a one-hour variety show that focuses on pop-culture through the eyes of a gamer. Hosted by Athalus, founder of WoW Radio, and Synapse, formerly a DJ in Japan, Off-Topic pulls from rotating segments on conventions, celebrities, subculture, drinking games, celebs and more. From week-to-week, listeners may discover a new favorite web series, play a drinking game, or call in with their own questions or contributions.

image.title: Off-Topic : An Original Media For Gamers Production
